mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( function_code, function_name, function_type, parent_function_id, parent_function_code, icon) values( #{menuBeans.functionCode}, #{menuBeans.functionName}, #{menuBeans.functionType}, #{menuBeans.parentFunctionId}, #{menuBeans.parentFunctionCode}, #{menuBeans.icon} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu a set a.function_code=#{menuBeans.functionCode}, a.icon=#{menuBeans.icon}, a.parent_function_id=#{menuBeans.parentFunctionId}, a.function_name=#{menuBeans.functionName}, a.parent_function_code=#{menuBeans.parentFunctionCode} where a.function_id=#{menuBeans.functionId}
mapper.select: select function_id as functionId, function_code as functionCode, function_name as functionName, function_type as functionType, parent_function_id as parentFunctionId, icon, parent_function_code as parentFunctionCode from sys_menu
